name: Launch GTS 8 Wide Running Shoes - Men's

features: GuideRails® Holistic Support System: Brooks' innovative technology supports your body in its natural motion path while keeping excess movement in check
Lightweight cushion: Brooks' lightest BioMoGo DNA midsole cushioning provides a fast ride without any extra weight
Enhanced breathability: A new air mesh upper creates a closer-to-foot feel that's more breathable than ever before
Quick transitions: Added blown rubber in the forefoot propels you forward for a faster ride
